name: XWUI Cascader Component
description: Cascading dropdown selection component for hierarchical data. Allows selection through multiple levels of options. Supports click or hover expansion, and custom display rendering. Uses XWUIInput internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

expandTrigger.description: How to trigger expansion of child options

changeOnSelect.description: Whether to trigger change event when selecting a parent option

displayRender.description: Custom function to render the selected value display (not serializable in JSON)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the cascader

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected value path as array of option values
